Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly remarkable, and I believe it aligns well with your interests and needs. I look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
